data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: Shared boats for Muide - Meulestede - Afrikalaan

data.name: BoatsIntro
data.value: Through the District Budget of Ghent City, VZW Buut purchased three boats (type Whaly 450 classic), powered by an electric motor.

data.name: BoatsNames
data.value: These 3 boats, Lubeck, Limba and Leith were named after streets in the Muide-Meulestee-Afrikalaan neighborhood. These streets refer to ports. Names beginning with the letter L were chosen as a tribute to deceased community worker Lucien De Ridder.

data.name: BoatsReservation
data.value: The boats can be reserved online by neighborhood residents.

data.name: BoatsLocation
data.value: Enjoy the peace and beauty of our neighborhood from the water, from the Meulestedebrug to the Keizerspark. The boats are permanently moored at the lowered quay in Terneuzenlaan.
